word_mean: 〔NA〕 〔复larynges〕喉：肌和软骨性结构，内衬以粘膜，与气管上部及舌与舌骨以下的咽部连接，其主要括约肌保护着气管的入口，并作为发声器官起辅助作用。喉由9块软骨形成—甲状软骨、环状软骨、会厌、2块杓状软骨、2块小角状软骨和2块楔状软骨，有韧带连接

sentence.Network_en: The cry occurs when air is brought into contact with the baby's larynx.
sentence.Network_cn: 婴儿的喉咙接触到空气时，就会哭出来。

entry.def: Your larynx is the top part of the passage that leads from your throat to your lungs and contains your vocal cords.

means.word_mean: 1. a cartilaginous structure at the top of the trachea; contains elastic vocal cords that are the source of the vocal tone in speech
